prompts: Create an adorable Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a fluffy bunny with oversized ears.
Imagine a playful Pokemon character with soft brown fur and light yellow accents.
Design a small creature that hops quickly, combining brown and cream colors in its appearance.
Generate a cute Pokemon featuring a round body shape and big expressive eyes.
Give me a forest-dwelling Pokemon that loves to play and is known for its speed.
Show me a tiny Pokemon that has fluffy feet and soft, velvety fur.
Make a Normal-type Pokemon with a cheerful demeanor and a penchant for hopping around.
